ModelName: Dynamic perception with Policy Selection v1
ModelAnnotation: This model relates a single hidden state to a single observable modality. It is a dynamic model because it tracks changes in the hidden state through time. There is Action applied via policy selection (π).
ActInfOntologyAnnotation:
A=RecognitionMatrix
B=TransitionMatrix
C=Preference
D=Prior
G=ExpectedFreeEnergy
s=HiddenState
s_prime=NextHiddenState
o=Observation
π=PolicyVector
t=Time
